title: Write a Script for a Podcast
description: A podcast host needs to write a script for an upcoming episode that includes an introduction, interview questions, and an outro.

tasks.description: Outline the structure of the podcast episode.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear outline with all segments is created.

tasks.description: Write a compelling introduction to hook the listener and introduce the topic and guest.
Write a list of questions for the interview segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive list of interview questions is prepared.

tasks.description: Write a concluding outro that summarizes the key takeaways and includes a call to action (e.g., 'subscribe to our podcast').
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and effective outro is drafted.
